what.title: What is Mindra?
what.text: Mindra is a supportive AI project designed to help you feel heard, grounded, and motivated. It’s not about pressure or productivity — it’s about care, presence, and steady progress.

1.title: Talk freely
1.text: Share what’s on your mind — stress, doubts, burnout, or everyday thoughts.

2.title: Get support
2.text: Receive calm, empathetic responses, guidance, and emotional support.

3.title: Move forward
3.text: Set goals, build habits, track progress, and grow at your own pace.
